title: Stuck in Authenticating 29/11/17
body: Having trouble getting past authenticating, I have uninstalled and reinstalled the game, I have opened as admin, I have run as admin, I have done all Riots suggestions and Im still stuck. I tried to go through Support but when I try to take a "ticket" it says there are issues with the login on the website even tho Im already logged onto the website. What am I supposed to do? I put money into my account and I just wanna play my lil stupid lulu one trick account ;n; {{champion:117}}
